sentences.en: A bumper wheat harvest is anticipated [ expected ] this year.
sentences.cn: 今年小麦 可望 获得丰收.

sentences.en: A nationwide good harvest soon brought down the price of rice.
sentences.cn: 全国性的大丰收很快使米价回跌了.

sentences.en: a record grain harvest of 236m tonnes
sentences.cn: 2.36亿公吨创纪录的谷物收获量

sentences.en: A succession of bad harvest had reduced the small farmer to penury.
sentences.cn: 连续歉收使得这个小农场主陷入了贫困境地.

sentences.en: After the harvest, the peasants began to prepare the soil for seed.
sentences.cn: 收割后, 农民就开始整地以便播种.

sentences.en: Comet also sired the champion foal out of Spinway Harvest.
sentences.cn: “彗星”还跟“斯平威·哈维斯特”生下了这匹出类拔萃的小马驹。

sentences.en: Farmers are extremely busy during the harvest.
sentences.cn: 农民在收获季节里十分忙碌。

sentences.en: In the swift the day before that year's wheat harvest, a rainstorm threatened.
sentences.cn: 在那一年麦收的前一天, 一场暴雨眼看就要来临.

sentences.en: It is not easy to reap the harvest of my hard work.
sentences.cn: 获得自己辛勤工作的成果是不容易的.

sentences.en: It's still too early to harvest the wheat now.
Plum growers are expecting a bumper harvest this year.
sentences.cn: 种植李树的农民期盼着今年有个好收成。

sentences.en: Rice farmers here still plant and harvest their crops by hand.
sentences.cn: 这里种植水稻的农场主仍是人工种植和收割庄稼。

sentences.en: The company is now reaping the harvest of careful planning.
sentences.cn: 公司现在尝到了精心规划带来的甜头。

sentences.en: The painting represents the scene of a bumper harvest.
sentences.cn: 这幅画描绘了丰收的景象.

sentences.en: The sunburnt grass breathed a harvest breath of dry sweetness and content.
sentences.cn: 草给阳光晒枯了,发出一阵叫人意满心欢的收获期的芳香气息.

sentences.en: There was about 300 million tons of grain in the fields at the start of the harvest.
sentences.cn: 收割伊始田间大约有三亿吨的谷物。

sentences.en: This year's harvest is even better than last year's.
sentences.cn: 今年的收成比去年还要好.

sentences.en: Unfavourable weather has had damaging effects on this year's harvest.
sentences.cn: 恶劣天气使今年的收成受到了损失。

phrases.tran_cn: 收获节（由基督教教会所举行）

trans.tran_en: the time when crops are gathered from the fields, or the act of gathering them
the time when crops are gathered from the fields, or the act of gathering them
to gather crops from the fields
